Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsb.ms.syn.common.util.Utils

extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class providing several different services that are useful in different aspects of the application

      • getScaleConvertedValue

        public static float getScaleConvertedValue(float val,
                           float osl,
                           float osh,
                           float nsl,
                           float nsh)
        Converts a data point "val" in some scale [osl, osh] to a data point in some other scale [nsl, nsh] using a linear mathematical function f(x) = m * x + b.
        Parameters:
        val - Value to be converted from the old scale
        osl - Low boundary of the old scale
        osh - High boundary of the old scale
        nsl - Low boundary of the new scale
        nsh - High boundary of the new scale
        Returns:
        Value in the new scale
